name: Chasing Shadows (DotClassGames, Mar8i8o)
description:
Chasing Shadows

Sidescroller parkour game, in which you will have to run from your other self.

Game made for the Mouse Jam 2 game jam.

The main challenge of the jam was to make a game using only the mouse as input and using the theme "chase".

Used asset credits:

Player: https://clembod.itch.io/warrior-free-animation-set

Background and platforms: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-scrolling-city-backgrounds-pixel-art

Fonts: https://fontesk.com/chill-pixels-fonts/

Start screen: https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-sky-with-clouds-background-pixel-art-set
